importExport.message:
This will backup or restore SSD settings and thumbnails.

Note, all speed dials are managed by the browser as bookmarks. Make sure they are backed up separately via the bookmarks manager or sync.

WARNING: Importing will replace your current settings.

newInstall2.message: ⭐ Add sites by clicking the button below, or add bookmarks to the Speed Dial folder

newInstall3.message: ✨ Dials can be modified by right-clicking on them

newInstall4.message: 💎 Access more settings by clicking the gear in the top-right corner
